refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: find a zero of a system of n nonlinear functions in n variables by a modification of the powell hybrid method. Jacobian may be provided.
fct is an "external". This external returns v=fct(x) given x.

refsection.programlisting: fct(n,x,v,iflag) integer n,iflag double precision x(n),v(n)
refsection.para: jac is an "external". This external returns v=d(fct)/dx (x) given x.
